data.text:
@EU_Commission @Scotsfox Love Bulgarian rose water, Mrs Hairy does a rice pudding that contains it (if we can find it) best in the world. 
Go Bulgaria.
@EU_Commission I am proud to have participated in helping to bring it about during my years in the European Commission. It is a great achievement (and one the UK was very much at the heart of!)
@EU_Commission no they have been screwed by its protectionist tariffs driving up costs and unwieldy regulations

@EU_Commission 1. Waarom blijft U dit publiceren en reageert U niet op de antwoorden die U oproep? 
2. Waarom stelt U deze vraag in het Engels, de taal van het land dat worstelt om de EG te verlaten? Er is een kostbare organisatie van tolken in de EG die zelfs van Lets naar Grieks kan vertalen
@EU_Commission Stop article 13 or we all gonna vote anti-EU !!!
@EU_Commission What evidence do you have that women earn less because they are women? Btw. which election campaign promise does equal pay for men and women fulfill?
@EU_Commission I don't see any future if the Copyright Directive gets approved.
@EU_Commission Stop the saving light time forever.
@EU_Commission As men, more than women, love fast driving, burning wood or anything, eating meat, using fireworks, etc., etc. make these things much more expensive please.
@EU_Commission But Jihadists saying that they are going to conquer EU. Long term 200 year plan is necessary to preserve EU values. Osama bin laden’s son is in Pakistan. Catch him before next 9/11.
@EU_Commission Why don’t you just leave member states alone to decide under their own democratic government systems? Why is it your business? 😐
@EU_Commission I don't know what's up but almost all of the supply chain comes from China nowadays. What are the EU plans for the future?
@EU_Commission can you tell the  Kosovo younger's doe's deserved the bad political that you have
@EU_Commission Aye, those young people in Greece just love it.
@EU_Commission Listen to the people and not the industry
@EU_Commission God damn stop it
@EU_Commission It's nice out. Think I prefer being out.
@EU_Commission Look what we are throwing away. 😥
@EU_Commission Maybe the EU is a good idea. Just keep the immigrants out and deport like 80% of the immigrants living in the EU and im fine.

@EU_Commission @mcgough_p The Single Market, Britain’s big achievement in the EU, is one of the EU’s greatest successes. 

And having been a driving force in leading the EU in setting it up, we now plan to walk away. Time for a rethink. Time for the People’s Vote.
@EU_Commission now the EZB want to shorten the rights of the consumers- the right to pay cash - that is undemocratic - and we, the people don‘t want to accept!!!

@EU_Commission For how much longer will the European Commission be able to support the single market and the associated "Euro" in the face of the obvious failures of the "Euro" in coping with localised inflation/deflation?
@EU_Commission Stop importing Africa

@EU_Commission Very good. But unless the single market is good for climate and the environment none of it makes much difference to the nightmare facing the next generation and generations to come. If ever political courage was needed, it's now.
@EU_Commission NEXIT! As quick as possible!
@EU_Commission EC fuck you!
@EU_Commission Why do my hopes and dreams for Europe have to be compatible with “shaping the EU”? My dream is that the EU is replaced by something like a free-trade zone.
@EU_Commission Great way to get young people involved in politics.
@EU_Commission Happy national day,  Bulgaria!
@EU_Commission @MartinSelmayr 🇪🇺 Europe works.

@EU_Commission @daniela_lenzu @PhilHoganEU @EUAgri @danielrosarioEU Hello!
Do you know Bystmatsi and Lybumets Refugee Camp in the Bulgaria? Do you know that there is a law? According to that law they keep a refugees for 18 months or until lost all hopes. We have lost everything like family, money, career, hopes, relationships.

@EU_Commission @W_A_T_O_N Happy national day Bulgaria! 

Great memories of Sofia in 2014, supporting @gbbasketball U20 women at European Championships.
Exciting games!
Lovely city!
Rose foot cream was fabulous!
@EU_Commission #plovdiv is one of the nicest cities I have been to #bulgaria @Plovdiv2019 @Bulgaria
@EU_Commission Always so funny 😂😂😂 art 13 😂😂😂

@EU_Commission Unemployment is high in South , low in North. Look the numbers for Portugal, Espana, Italy, Greece , Bulgaria. EURO is very expensive . Many jobs given to Turkey. This is not economic policy.

@EU_Commission If you really love our comment, listen them, understand them and especially : LISTEN TO US ! #SaveYourInternet #FutureofEurope 
If you want a future for Europe, Delete Article 13 and 11 and Listen your people and please, stop thinking about MONEY ! Stop ignoring us and lying ! 😠

@EU_Commission @EU_Commission Delete the Representative Democracy and establish Direct Democracy! We the People of Europe don't want to be governed, we want to govern! Put an End to Lobbists and Ban them from all Institutions of the EU!
@EU_Commission Yes tax the crap out of me and enslaved my country. They then waste my money I can’t do anything about it. That’s why we must walk away from this corrupt club.
@EU_Commission Bulgaria Stay With EU ! Not with Soviet Union! Vote for Romanian Candidate EU Prosecutor, not Against! We watching you !

@EU_Commission Calm down, folks!
To be open minded doesn't mean you have a skull fracture.
@EU_Commission I visited Bulgaria last year. And toured the country. What a great place to be!!!
@EU_Commission Happy National Day!
@EU_Commission That's one more irritation BLOCKED
@EU_Commission Честит трети март! Happy 3rd March ❤️❤️❤️🇧🇬🇧🇬🇧🇬🇧🇬🇧🇬
@EU_Commission @ECinBulgaria @RCERomania @ro2019eu I didn’t notice you wish Wales 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁷󠁬󠁳󠁿 a Happy St David’s Day on March 1st 🤷‍♀️ if you do it for one country, you do it for all, surely?
@EU_Commission I didn’t notice you wish Wales 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁷󠁬󠁳󠁿 a Happy St David’s Day on March 1st 🤷‍♀️ if you do it for one country, you do it for all, surely?
@EU_Commission I see an EU where #SCOTLAND is EU28, Good for Scotland better for the EU.
@EU_Commission @RobHeetland exact wat #EU is: een veeeeel te grote doos voor 1 mobieltje!
@EU_Commission @fatisourfriend I'll be generous to you too. Simply pay me £1 per person and then ask me where you would like me to donate 40p back to.
@EU_Commission Here is my vision,i like to bi united Bud not dictaited,at the moment the eu is run by people who dont even try to lissen to there members.

@EU_Commission @CarolNdosi I assume somewhere we will be able to get disaggregated data on each particular country to be able to know exactly where the problem is !!!!!
Any possibility to have African Data up to lowers level of administration will be fantastic. Any report?
@EU_Commission NO! to uploadfilters
@EU_Commission ▪️It would be nice if you stop boycotting workaholics, technology and civilians for a while- those whose family does not have any European army, you know.
@EU_Commission 💫 I am for going to #Mars. Hope eventually one generation in the Future settles there and we forget forever about your 19thC continent.
@EU_Commission no!

@EU_Commission The political pendulum will continue swinging out left until the ppl have had enough then it will over correct and swing too far right .violence will begin from discontent left wing radicals to be quashed by the right invoking sympathy then starting the pendulum swing back left.

@EU_Commission ▪️My family does not belong to the European 🇪🇺 aristocracy, I do not own European land and I do not care about your European beaches. My family are those Franco's losers- without lands- EU🇪🇺 could not care less about.
▪️It is not people...It is the Land stupid !

@EU_Commission In that case, how about "NO" to  #Article13 and #Article11 ?

It's well meant and a worthy goal, but the way you put it together is an incompetent, ignorant, chaotic mess.

#ShirleyException 
#wellmeantisnotwelldone

@EU_Commission My hope is that the millions of anti-EU simpletons will finally realise that the EU has done nothing that was not supported by the national politicians that they elected. The EU is constantly used as a scapegoat. This needs to stop, only then will there be a future for the EU.

@EU_Commission @Senficon Then stop Article 13. That is the voice of your citizens that EC is refusing to listen. There are not a bright future for Europe without a healthy internet, how hard is to understand that?
@EU_Commission Then remove article 13 #SaveYourInternet #FutureofEurope
@EU_Commission By give freedom to the National Gov.  when they ask to take more to them.
@EU_Commission Scrap article 13 you globalist assholes
@EU_Commission Propaganda.
@EU_Commission There you got my answers. Maybe someone reads it.
@EU_Commission Is the EU doing enough to mitigate climate change?? No.
@EU_Commission So Wwhy do you accept an illegal deal with Morocco occupation army to expoliate the fisheries of Western Sahara, without any benefit for Saharawi refugee people??
@EU_Commission Remove Article 13
@EU_Commission Stop article 13

@EU_Commission @EU_Eurostat @ChristianWigand @JunckerEU @eucopresident UK is 4% and falling nearly half EU average and Spain is 15.2%, FRANCE 9.2% and Italy 10.2%. EU is slowest growing economic region in the world. EU is failing on so many levels. This German project is coming to its natural end.  R.I.P EU
@EU_Commission @vjl2 Why is the UK not on your webpage list. We are still members.

@EU_Commission Unless articles 13 and 11 are removed ,which they never were, these tweets are nothing but hollow promises. Our voices will never be heard thanks to your copyright directive. All we'll hear is your voice,and we're expected to bow to you. Praising that "the Party is always right"!
@EU_Commission Youth unemployment in Greece Spain and Italy is nearly 25% the EU economy is the slowest growing economic area in the world outside of sub Sahara Africa

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @eucopresident you people need to read this. You’re literally hated. You have to ask yourself one question. Which country would still vote to me a member? What you are left with is a group of hostages,#Brexit will show everyone is there is life outside you’re prison
@EU_Commission Nothing!
@EU_Commission Ban article 13

@EU_Commission The EU has taken money every year from every man woman and child in the UK for over forty years and ploughed that money into a corrupt largely unelected group of bureaucrats and drunks (@JunckerEU ) to pass onto other countries such as Poland who go on to take UK jobs @CadburyUK
@EU_Commission Boi, one of your major concerns right now should be editing Article 13 as I said once already.

@EU_Commission Africa can never develop as long as the European Union/ European countries accept to keep saving all the looted money by African politicians/Leaders. All stolen money from Africa MUST AND SHULD BE RETURNED.

@EU_Commission @Senficon #FutureofEurope should be to protect free speech and the rights of private and non-commercial creators just as well as the big ones. It does include fair Copyright reform without buy-out - not lobby driven bs like #Article12 #Article13 and #Article11.

@EU_Commission For me: I was the one who saved the Greek flag, the only flag didn’t fell down during the 2003 war in Iraq, I have been awarded from Greek president with silver cross. more than 15 years serving Greece .. finally because I didn’t obey corrupted  maters .. all become under feet.

@EU_Commission European Union is today's world's largest and wonderful achievement that brings together so many cultures and states with the aim of a life a human being dreams of- good luck #EUelections2019 
Editor-in-Chief of The HeadQuarters Daily @SardarMandokhel

@EU_Commission For my region (Iraq): European mission is there to write articles and speak for human rights and this is the last thing to do looking only for its benefits through Iraq .. is there to make every month a table of the best food to feed its members out of Iraqi blood

@EU_Commission For my work: Greece as a member of European Union used me to work at its mission in Iraq for more than 15 years then just drop me out without giving me any right without being insured just because I didn’t accept to take a part in corrupted matters
@EU_Commission According to this compass you're going southeast, toward China and that's a good prediction because China will buy a half of Europe in not so distant future.

@EU_Commission If you pass Articles 11 & 13, there will be no EU in the future. Save yourselves from risking on ending the world's biggest political community by voting against it #Article11 #Article13 #SaveYourInternet
@EU_Commission In Romania, we have discrimination between professionals and not nor!
@EU_Commission not in spain
@EU_Commission The survey in Greek is not functioning.... (The open ended question)

@EU_Commission The EU doesn’t make anything or sell anything.
We don't get money from a EU fund, it’s OUR money to begin with.
If we don't pay it in there is no fund.
If we’re not in the EU there will be more money allocated for things as we won't be subsidising other countries just our own!

@EU_Commission @StylianidesEU @EU_Eurostat @ChristianWigand CIA, MI6, KGB, & all the world intelligence agencies invites for an urgent public polling questionnaire in all Yemen to discover that the civilians citizens DIDN'T received any humanitarian aids.

The 3000 Millons Dollars donations for the UN "employees" where it goes since 2015?
@EU_Commission
@EU_Commission #FutureofEurope without #Article13.

@EU_Commission @Lophophanes Done nothing where I live. Roads are in a shocking state, A1 to Edinburgh still single carriageway in parts, yet I'll soon be driving all over rural Spain on brand new 3-lane, EU-funded motorways! Do me a favour with your nonsense.
